name: Negative Thoughts
description:
(This game will take around 4min to complete, including tutorial)

Sometimes, people have negative intrusive thoughts. Sometimes, these thoughts can be harmful for mental health. Sometimes, not everyone can handle it. Can you help me keep control of my mind and head space?

Controls:

Click to move

Type to type positive words

Click and drag typed words to heal/attack

(TIP: You can type anything, so use words of encouragement with as little/close together on the keyboard letters as possible. I'm specifically partial to REEEE)

Credits:

Title music: Forever by Whitesand

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LXJcwn_rfqM

Game music: Touch by Mattia Cupelli

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_JYHk_D5A44

Winning music: A new beginning by Neutrin05

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y75rn0HNUBI

Losing music: Dissociation by Naoya Sakamata

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T9yWYs0XsQk
